str2: A prolonged form of nun for emphasis; just now.
A primary particle; but, and, etc.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Middle or Passive - 1st Person Singular

str2: A primary preposition; to or into, of place, time, or purpose; also in adverbial phrases.
Of Hebrew origin; Hierusalem, the capitol of Palestine.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: From diakonos; to be an attendant, i.e. Wait upon (figuratively) teacher; technically, to act as a Christian deacon.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Set apart by (or for) God, holy, sacred. From hagos; sacred.
